Question: NTT sonority CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
NTT Sonority

Product: nwm MBE001 True Wireless On-Ear Speakers

- Features PSZ (Personalized Sound Zone) technology for a private acoustic space
- Minimizes sound leakage, allowing ambient sounds and conversations to be heard
- Balanced listening comfort with clear voice transmission
- Advanced sound technology for crystal-clear audio and immersive bass
- Seamless wireless connectivity with Bluetooth technology
- Customizable sound presets via the nwm Connect app
- Ultra-lightweight design weighing only 9g
- Up to 6 hours of battery life on a single charge
- Intuitive touch-sensitive button controls

The nwm MBE001 True Wireless On-Ear Speakers offer a revolutionary audio experience, leveraging PSZ technology to create a private acoustic space while maintaining situational awareness. This product aims to enhance user comfort and connectivity through sound, without disturbing others in the surroundings.
